Dialogue.text: Hello there! My name is Miss Puffin! Nice to meet you!
Dialogue.Speaker: Miss Puffin

Dialogue.text: I am looking for Pearls from the Clam Clans, they said they are willing to share their pearls if I can find them!
Dialogue.Speaker: Miss Puffin

Dialogue.text: I wish to make a pearl necklace, as it is my sisters birthday!
Dialogue.Speaker: Miss Puffin

Dialogue.text: But I am having a hard time finding one, this place is like a maze!
Dialogue.Speaker: Miss Puffin

Dialogue.text: We can explore the area while we help her.
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally

Dialogue.text: Perfect! you three are such darlings!
Dialogue.Speaker: Miss Puffin

Dialogue.text: Oh! Thank you thank you! You people are so helpful!
Dialogue.Speaker: Miss Puffin

Dialogue.text: Now, I must be off to make my sister her birthday necklace! Ciaociao!
Dialogue.Speaker: Miss Puffin

Dialogue.text: Let's bring it back to the ship!
Dialogue.Speaker: Sally
